alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 5:23PM CDT until July 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Louin to near Vernon to near Stafford Springs, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Sandersville and Mill Creek around 545 PM CDT. Soso and Tuckers Crossing around 615 PM CDT. Laurel and Ovett around 640 PM CDT. Ellisville around 645 PM CDT. Moselle around 700 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
